title: MythicMobs的报错Exception thrown whilst executing task
txt_content:
我的MythicMobs出现报错，水桶端1.13.2，MM版本4.9.0，报错对功能毫无影响，但是就是在后台刷屏，看着贼烦人，报错如下:
 [MythicMobs] [31m[SCHEDULER] Exception thrown whilst executing task[37m
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.bukkit.entity.Player.sendActionBar(Ljava/lang/String;)V
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.mechanics.SendActionMessageMechanic.castAtEntity(SendActionMessageMechanic.java:35)
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.SkillMechanic.lambda$executeTargetedEntitySkill$5(SkillMechanic.java:445)
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at java.lang.Iterable.forEach(Unknown Source)
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.SkillMechanic.executeTargetedEntitySkill(SkillMechanic.java:441)
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.SkillMechanic.executeSkills(SkillMechanic.java:394)
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.SkillMechanic.execute(SkillMechanic.java:320)
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.SkillManager.executeMobTimerSkills(SkillManager.java:337)
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.SkillManager.runTimerSkills(SkillManager.java:319)
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.clock.MythicMobsAsyncClock.run(MythicMobsAsyncClock.java:21)
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.utils.Delegates$RunnableToConsumer.accept(Delegates.java:63)
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.utils.Schedulers$LumineTask.run(Schedulers.java:164)
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_13_R2.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:81)
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_13_R2.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:52)
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
[14:14:59] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 57/WARN]:         at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
3170606453 发表于 2020-5-9 20:13
最关键我在整个MM文件夹范围搜索 也没有actionbar关键词的技能
https://jingyan.baidu.com/article/27fa732646eb2846f8271f2f.html

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
看上去是兼容的问题。先更新下试试
https://www.mythicmobs.net/index.php?pages/download/

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
那你就用csf屏蔽吧
[综合|优化]Console Spam Fix —— 让控制台变得干净[1.7-1.15]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-912870-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
好像是官方自带的bug
https://www.mythicmobs.net/index ... -work-1-15-2.11407/

把跟actionbar有关的skill移除掉就好了
